comment: She will either neglect her poor daughter or use her as a personal crutch to lean on when things don‚Äôt go her way. Selfish tactics don‚Äôt go away over night. Johnny Depp said that his life began when his daughter was born but worded it with authentication and passion. Amber Heard, on the other hand tried to say the same but used (against Elon Musk‚Äôs permission) frozen embryos after holding onto it when they split and ALSO USED someone else as a surrogate because she probably doesn‚Äôt want to go through the effort even if it gives her the justice she craves. Then she timed out her announcement of her baby a couple months later according to her agenda. See all the tools she has so she wouldn‚Äôt have to deal with the trouble?  An ongoing theme in the name of extreme selfishness and narcissism. Obtaining a baby does not mean START OVER. The baby‚Äôs life is just beginning, she can‚Äôt take its life as an excuse for her abusive, manipulative, evil behavior. How can she guarantee a happy life for her daughter if its purpose is to solely serve her in ways such as avoiding prison time or to save her name? Amber has the worst provenly irreversible toxic human nature I‚Äôve ever heard of. Poor baby and poor anyone she‚Äôs ever used for her benefit. Not only did she bring injustice to actual abuse victims, she ALSO brings injustice to women who are incapable of having children because of infertility. What‚Äôs she scheming next? The list goes on but it can‚Äôt fit in a single comment so imma leave it here. üôÑ As a HUMAN BEING, we don‚Äôt claim her!!!!
